name: Sundar Pichai
title: CEO
quote: AI is one of the most important things humanity is working on. It is more profound than electricity or fire.

name: Sundar Pichai
title: CEO
quote: AI isn't here to take jobs — at least not at Google. It allows us to do more.

name: Sundar Pichai
title: CEO
quote: We know that 20 to 30 years ago you educated yourself and that carried you through for the rest of your life. That is not going to be true for the generation which is being born now. They have to learn continuously over their lives.

name: Sundar Pichai
title: CEO
quote: Jobs that would be disrupted by AI would include knowledge workers including writers accountants architects and even software engineers. For example you could be a radiologist if you think about five to 10 years from now you're going to have an AI collaborator with you.

name: Matt Garman
title: CEO
quote: I think part of going to college is building critical thinking. It's less about the development of skills and it really is how do you become a critical thinker? In some ways I think that's actually going to be the most important skill going forward.

name: Sam Altman
title: CEO
quote: Critical thinking could be the most valuable skill of the future for human workers particularly those tasked with curating and refining the output of AI tools. AI can generate lots of great ideas but you still need a human there to say This is the thing other people want.

name: Satya Nadella
title: CEO
quote: AI cannot replace human qualities like creativity empathy and judgment. Instead AI will amplify our human capabilities and help cultivate our creative spirit.

name: Satya Nadella
title: CEO
quote: The biggest lesson learned is we have to take the unintended consequences of any new technology along with all the benefits and think about them simultaneously – as opposed to waiting for the unintended consequences to show up and then address them.

name: Tim Cook
title: CEO
quote: What all of us have to do is to make sure we are using AI in a way that is for the benefit of humanity not to the detriment of humanity.

name: Tim Cook
title: CEO
quote: Cook sees the future in jobs that blend human judgment with machine assistance such as doctors using AI for diagnosis or teachers strengthening instruction through adaptive platforms. Technology makes empathy problem-solving creativity and strategic thinking even more valuable.

name: Tim Cook
title: CEO
quote: AI literacy is no longer a mere option for any student entering a competitive job market. Hiring managers will now look for candidates who understand artificial intelligence machine learning and data-based decision-making.

name: Elon Musk
title: CEO
quote: There will come a point where no job is needed. AI will be able to do everything.

name: Elon Musk
title: CEO
quote: In a benign scenario probably none of us will have a job. The AI would be able to do everything.

name: Elon Musk
title: CEO
quote: The question will really be one of meaning. If a computer and the robots can do everything better than you does your life have meaning?

name: Elon Musk
title: CEO
quote: Automation could free workers to focus on more complex and challenging work that requires critical thinking and problem-solving.

name: Jamie Dimon
title: CEO
quote: Over time we anticipate that our use of AI has the potential to augment virtually every job as well as impact our workforce composition.

name: Jamie Dimon
title: CEO
quote: AI may be as impactful on humanity as some of the major technological inventions of the past several hundred years: Think the printing press the steam engine electricity computing and the Internet.

name: Jamie Dimon
title: CEO
quote: We have to find a better way to help the people who get hurt by AI. We love to retrain people redeploy them re-educate them.

name: Jamie Dimon
title: CEO
quote: The next generation of employees will live to 100 and work 3.5 days a week thanks to artificial intelligence.

name: David Solomon
title: CEO
quote: AI can draft 95% of an IPO prospectus in minutes. The last 5 percent now matters because the rest is now a commodity.

name: David Solomon
title: CEO
quote: AI is not a bubble. It's a trend that we're in the early stages of seeing how it affects business productivity.

name: David Solomon
title: CEO
quote: Productivity is the ability to take smart people and give them tools so they can do more do more quickly help our clients think about things in different ways.

name: Bob Sternfels
title: Global Managing Partner
quote: You can get to a pretty good average answer using the technology now. So the kind of basic layer of mediocre expertise goes away. But the distinctive expertise becomes even more valuable.

name: Bob Sternfels
title: Global Managing Partner
quote: Increasingly you're going to have to learn over a career at a rate you and I have never seen.

name: Bob Sternfels
title: Global Managing Partner
quote: That is something I don't think will be disrupted by AI. McKinsey's reputation as a leadership factory.

name: Bob Sternfels
title: Global Managing Partner
quote: I'm personally passionate about this notion of resilience as a skill. We talk about resilience as a muscle that needs to be built.

name: Mary Barra
title: CEO
quote: Autonomous technology that's safer than a car with a human driver is coming and it's going to get better and better and better with technologies like artificial intelligence and machine learning.

name: Mary Barra
title: CEO
quote: CEOs need to be fluent in emerging technologies but artificial intelligence will become as ubiquitous as did mobile and digital.

name: Mary Barra
title: CEO
quote: 40% of our technical talent has been with the company for less than five years. There are a lot of millennials and Gen Zs and they bring a different energy.

name: Arvind Krishna
title: CEO
quote: Jobs that require critical thinking will very much be in demand jobs that require creativity will very much be in demand but a lot of good jobs will be eliminated.

name: Arvind Krishna
title: CEO
quote: Today's workforce should prepare to work hand in hand with AI. AI solutions are being deployed to help tackle the kind of tasks most people find repetitive which frees up employees to take on higher-value work.

name: Arvind Krishna
title: CEO
quote: We are going to need technology to do some of the mundane work so that people can do higher-value work.

name: Arvind Krishna
title: CEO
quote: Every organization will become an AI organization – not because they can but because they must. AI is the only way to scale innovation insight and expertise.

name: Andy Jassy
title: CEO
quote: AI and generative AI specifically is the most transformative technology of our lifetime which is saying a lot given that we have had the internet.

name: Andy Jassy
title: CEO
quote: There will be fewer people doing some of the jobs that the technology actually starts to automate.

name: Andy Jassy
title: CEO
quote: AI will make all our teammates' jobs more enjoyable freeing them up from having to do the rote functions that could not previously be automated.

name: Andy Jassy
title: CEO
quote: Companies have two choices: to embrace and shape the change that's coming or wish it away and have it shape you.

name: Brian Moynihan
title: CEO
quote: Artificial Intelligence allows us to change the work across many more areas of our company effectively than prior tools allowed us.

name: Brian Moynihan
title: CEO
quote: Every decision we have to make as a leader you have to think about who's going to do it not what the decision is because decisions are relatively easy.

name: Brian Moynihan
title: CEO
quote: The adoption of technology at the second-biggest U.S. lender has allowed him to cut 100000 workers in less than a decade.

name: Dario Gil
title: SVP and Director of Research
quote: Don't be an AI user be an AI value creator. Use the technology but think more structurally about how to create value in whatever domain you are in.

name: Dario Gil
title: SVP and Director of Research
quote: The future of AI is to be open. This is an indispensable element to make it safe innovative and distribute economic benefits to the world.

name: Klaus Schwab
title: Founder and Executive Chairman
quote: In the future talent more than capital will represent the critical factor of production.

name: Klaus Schwab
title: Founder and Executive Chairman
quote: The Fourth Industrial Revolution does not just disrupt employment it creates a shortfall of newly required skills.

name: Klaus Schwab
title: Founder and Executive Chairman
quote: We need to shape a future that works for all of us by putting people first and empowering them.

name: Reed Hastings
title: Co-Founder and Executive Chairman
quote: We're going to be fighting for the survival of humanity and the flourishing of humanity. AI will be much bigger than the social networking change.

name: Reed Hastings
title: Co-Founder and Executive Chairman
quote: It's tough to think about entertainment when I'm not sure if we're going to be entertaining you or entertaining AIs.

name: Reed Hastings
title: Co-Founder and Executive Chairman
quote: I'm joining Anthropic's board because I believe in their approach to AI development and to help humanity progress.

name: Ginni Rometty
title: Former CEO
quote: I expect AI to change 100 percent of jobs within the next five to 10 years.

name: Ginni Rometty
title: Former CEO
quote: AI is not about automation. To get real value people must change how they think about things and how they do things.

name: Ginni Rometty
title: Former CEO
quote: The purpose of all technology especially AI should be to augment humanity not replace it.

name: Ginni Rometty
title: Former CEO
quote: In every case the person that cooperated with the AI plays a pivotal role in the outcome. The combination of man and machine creates something that none of them can do alone.

name: Dara Khosrowshahi
title: CEO
quote: AI is not going to replace you. The thing that's going to replace you is a human who knows how to use AI.

name: Dara Khosrowshahi
title: CEO
quote: There's a perception that AI is a tech thing but it's a broad tool to be used for everybody.

name: Dara Khosrowshahi
title: CEO
quote: Uber has been an AI powered company for years and years and years. When you're routing your estimated time of arrival whether we batch your delivery pricing all of it is based on AI algorithms.

name: Daniel Zhang
title: Former CEO
quote: If your company fails to keep pace with budding AI technology you may be the loser for the next generation.

name: Daniel Zhang
title: Former CEO
quote: When people say AI they laugh and say that to us it's Alibaba intelligence because data and technology power everything we do.

name: Daniel Zhang
title: Former CEO
quote: AI would have a profound impact in the coming 10 to 15 years with everyone gaining access to an exclusive smart assistant and every household may have a smart family doctor.

name: Akio Toyoda
title: Chairman
quote: We should not make people into mere machine overseers. Automation should be centered on people.

name: Akio Toyoda
title: Chairman
quote: AI is already augmenting human skills and capabilities. The goal is a future where humans can spend more time focusing on creative strategic and enjoyable activities.

name: Carlos Ghosn
title: Former CEO
quote: There is no way we are going to have autonomous driverless cars without AI it's impossible. However AI will not completely solve all the issues. AI is an enabler but I don't think AI is going to completely substitute the human mind.

name: Carlos Ghosn
title: Former CEO
quote: Over the next five years the automobile will be transformed from a transportation device into a smart intelligent mobile space.
